catalogPage.generalText: Welcome to our furniture catalog! Here you will find a wide range of products for home and office.

descriptions.sofas: Cozy sofas of various sizes and colors — perfect for your living space.
descriptions.chairs: Strong and elegant chairs for home and office.
descriptions.tables: Dining, coffee, and work tables that blend functionality with modern design.
descriptions.beds: In our “Beds” category you’ll find comfortable and stylish models for any bedroom.
descriptions.wardrobes: Functional and stylish wardrobes suitable for any room.
descriptions.shelves: Convenient shelves for storing essentials and decor.
descriptions.desks: Comfortable desks for work, study, and creativity.
descriptions.benches: Benches that add both comfort and style to your space.
descriptions.mirrors: Mirrors in various shapes and styles to complete your interior.

faq.q1: How can I order custom furniture?
faq.a1: Choose a style and dimensions — our AI designer will help you create the perfect solution online!
faq.q2: Can I view a 3D model before purchasing?
faq.a2: All furniture is available in 3D with AR/VR integration for full immersion.
faq.a3: We use only certified materials that meet sustainable sourcing standards.
faq.q4: Do you deliver across Ukraine and abroad?
faq.a4: Yes! From Kyiv to London — we deliver furniture worldwide.
faq.q5: How does MebliHub use AI for recommendations?
faq.a5: Artificial intelligence analyzes your style and suggests the best furniture for your space.
